text: The Nepal Police own and operate the sports club known as Nepal Police Club (formerly Mahendra Police Club). The club plays in Nepal's premier club football league, the Martyr's Memorial A-Division League. Mahendra Police Club, which was founded in 1952 and is named for King Mahendra Bir Bikram Shah Dev, has been a member of the New Nepal League from that organization's founding. The club placed second in the 2004â€“05 season and third the next. ==References== Category:1966 establishments Category:Kathmandu Category:Asian football clubs
title: Nepal Police Club
